title: Privacy Policy
text1: The following privacy policy describes how ATHLEAD INDONESIA (PT Kita Athlead Indonesia, "we", "us" or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy notice will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website (Site) (regardless of where you visit it from) and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
text2: This privacy notice will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website (Site) (regardless of where you visit it from) and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
text3: This privacy notice is in a layered format so you can click through to the specific areas below.
title1: 01. IMPORTANT INFORMATION AND WHO WE ARE
title3: 03. HOW  YOUR PERSONAL DATA IS COLLECTED
title4: 04. HOW WE USE THE INFORMATION WE COLLECT
title5: 05. SHARING AND DISCLOSURE OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA
title9: 09. CONTACT INFORMATION AND RESPONSIBLE ATHLEAD INDONESIA ENTITIES
textContent1a: Purpose of this privacy notice. This privacy notice aims to give you information on how ATHLEAD INDONESIA collects and processes your personal data through your use of our Site or Application, including any data you may provide through our Site or Application when you purchase a service or sign up for our services. Our Site and Application are not intended for children and we do not knowingly collect data relating to children.
textContent1a1: It is important that you read this privacy notice together with any other privacy notice or fair processing notice we may provide on specific occasions when we are collecting or processing personal data about you so that you are fully aware of how and why we are using your data. This privacy notice supplements the other notices and is not intended to override them.
textContent1b: Controller. ATHLEAD INDONESIA is the controller and responsible for your personal data (collectively referred to as "ATHLEAD INDONESIA", "we", "us" or "our" in this privacy notice).We have appointed a data privacy manager who is responsible for overseeing questions about this privacy notice. If you have any questions about this privacy notice, including any requests to exercise your legal rights, please contact the data privacy manager using the details set out below.
textContent1c: Contact details Our full details are:Full name of legal entity: PT. Kita Athlead Indonesia  Email address: privacypolicy@athlead.id Postal address: Jl. KH. Ahmad Dahlan. No.7, RT.1/RW.1, Kramat Pela, Kec. Kebayoran Baru, Kota Jakarta Selatan, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 12130
textContent1c1: You have the right to make a complaint at any time to the Indonesian supervisory authority for data protection issues. We would, however, appreciate the chance to deal with your concerns before you approach the Indonesian supervisory authority for data protection issues so please contact us in the first instance.
textContent1d: Changes to the privacy notice and your duty to inform us of changes. This version was last updated on September 2022. The personal data we hold about you must be accurate and current. Please keep us informed if your personal data changes during your relationship with us.
textContent1e: Third-party links. Our Site may include links to third-party websites, plug-ins and applications. Clicking on those links or enabling those connections may allow third parties to collect or share data about you. We do not control these third-party websites and are not responsible for their privacy statements. When you leave our Site, we encourage you to read the privacy notice of every website you visit.
textContent2: We collect personal information about you when you use the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform. Without it, we may not be able to provide all services requested. This information includes:
textContent2a: Contact Information, Account, Profile Information. Such as your first name, last name, phone number, postal address, email address, date of birth, and profile photo, some of which will depend on the features you use.
textContent2b: Partner Information and Account. If you are using the Site or Application as a service provider/partner, in order for the Site or Application to work, you will need to provide us with the information on the services you can accept orders for at the time, and details as to your current, and after an order for a service placed by a user is accepted by you as the service provider/partners.
textContent2c: Identity Verification, Payment Information, and Transaction Data. If you utilize any payment and/or transactional services on the Site either to make a payment or receive any payment, we may collect certain Personal Data related to the payment and/or transactional services you used. It includes details about payments to and from you and other details of products and services you have purchased from us.
textContent2d: Other Information. Such as when you fill in a form, add information to your account, respond to surveys, post to community forums, participate in promotions, communicate with our customer care team and other Members, or share your experience with us. This may include health information if you choose to share it with us.
textContent2e: Other Sources. To the extent permitted by applicable law, we may receive additional information about you, such as references, demographic data, or information to help detect fraud and safety issues from third-party service providers and/or partners and combine it with information we have about you. For example, we may receive background check results or fraud warnings from identity verification service providers for use in our fraud prevention and risk assessment efforts. We may receive information about you and your activities on and off the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform, or about your experiences and interactions from our partners. We may receive health information, including but not limited to, health information related to contagious diseases.
textContent3a: When you register and create an account on the Site as a user and/or Partner/ Service Provider, we may request you to provide us with certain Personal Data including (but not limited to) your name, phone number, or email address. Specifically for Partner/Service Provider, we may also request you to provide us with certain Personal Information that is needed to verify your onboarding process. The information can include the details of your business, and bank account information.
textContent3b: If you are a registered User and Partner/Service Provider, we might request you to provide your ATHLEAD INDONESIA user identification and login credentials in order to access your account.
textContent4a: Provide, Improve, and Develop the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform. Such as:
liA1: enable you to access the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform and make and receive payments,
liA2: enable you to communicate with other Members,
liA5: enable you to access the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform and make and receive payments,
liA6: send you messages, updates, security alerts, and account notifications,
liA7: To protect you from fraud detection and prevention, and to facilitate your requests or for any other purpose you authorize,
liA8: personalize and customize your experience based on your interactions with the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform, your search and booking history, your profile information and preferences, and other content you submit, and
liA9: enable your use of our enterprise products.
textContent4b: Create and Maintain a Trusted and Safer Environment. Including to:
liB1: detect and prevent fraud, spam, abuse, security and safety incidents, and other harmful activity,
liB2: conduct security investigations and risk assessments,
liB3: verify or authenticate information provided by you,
liB4: conduct checks against databases and other information sources, including background or police checks for Partner/Service Providers,
liB5: enforce our agreements with third parties,
liB6: comply with our legal obligations, protect the health and well-being,
liB7: comply with the law, respond to legal requests, prevent harm, and protect your rights,
liB8: in connection with the activities above, we may conduct profiling based on your interactions with the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform, your profile information and other content you submit to ATHLEAD INDONESIA, and information obtained from third parties. In limited cases, automated processes, which analyze your account and activities on the ATHLEAD INDONESIA platform as well as information about activities on and off the ATHLEAD INDONESIA platform that can be associated with you, could restrict or suspend access to the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform if such processes detect activity that may pose a safety or other risk to ATHLEAD INDONESIA, our community, or third parties. If you would like to challenge decisions based on automated processes, please contact us via the Contact Information section below.
textContent4c: Provide, Personalize, Measure, and Improve our Advertising and Marketing. For example :
liC1: send you promotional messages, marketing, advertising, and other information based on your preferences and social media advertising through social media platforms,
liC2: personalize, measure, and improve our advertising,
liC3: administer referral programs, rewards, surveys, sweepstakes, contests, or other promotional activities or events sponsored or managed by ATHLEAD INDONESIA or its third-party partners,
liC4: analyze characteristics and preferences to send you promotional messages, marketing, advertising, and other information that we think might be of interest to you, and
liC5: nvite you to events and relevant opportunities.
textContent4d: Provide Payment services. Personal information is used to enable, or authorize third parties to use, Payment Services such as to:
liD1: detect and prevent money laundering, fraud, abuse, and security incidents,
liD2: conduct security investigations and risk assessments,
liD3: comply with legal obligations (such as anti-money laundering regulations),
liD4: enforce the Payment Terms and other payment policies,
liD5: with your consent, send you promotional messages, marketing, advertising, and other information that may be of interest to you based on your preferences, and
textContent5: We may have to share your personal data with the parties set out below for the purposes set out in the table in the paragraph above.
li5b: Third parties to whom we may choose to sell, transfer, or merge parts of our business or our assets. Alternatively, we may seek to acquire other businesses or merge with them. If a change happens to our business, the new owners may use your personal data in the same way as this privacy notice.
textContent5a: We require all third parties to respect the security of your personal data and treat it according to the law. We do not allow our third-party service providers acting as processors to use your personal data for their purposes and only permit them to process your data for specified purposes and by our instructions. Third parties who act as joint controllers can decide how they process the personal data that we transfer to them but we will ensure that they are subject to legally binding obligations requiring them to do this following the law and only for the purposes that we have agreed with them.
textContent6: While no organization can guarantee perfect security, we are continuously implementing and updating administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration.
textContent7: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time following applicable law. If we do so, we will post the revised Privacy Policy and update the “Last Updated” date at the top. In case of material changes, we will also provide you with notice of the modification by email before the effective date. If you disagree with the revised Privacy Policy, you can cancel your Account. If you do not cancel your Account before the date the revised Privacy Policy becomes effective, your continued access to or use of the ATHLEAD INDONESIA Platform will be subject to the revised Privacy Policy.
textContent8: Understands your rights. Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws concerning your personal data. Such as:
li81: Request access to your personal data
li82: Request correction of your personal data
li83: Request erasure of your personal data
li84: Object to processing of your personal data
li85: Request restriction of processing your personal data
li86: Request transfer of your personal data
textContent8a: If you wish to exercise any of the rights set out above, please contact us
li8A1: No fee is usually required. You will not have to pay a fee to access your personal data (or to exercise any of the other rights). However, we may charge a reasonable fee if your request is clearly unfounded, repetitive or excessive. Alternatively, we may refuse to comply with your request in these circumstances.
li8A2: What we may need from you. We may need to request specific information from you to help us confirm your identity and ensure your right to access your personal data (or to exercise any of your other rights). This is a security measure to ensure that personal data is not disclosed to any person who has no right to receive it. We may also contact you to ask you for further information in relation to your request to speed up our response.
li8A3: Time limit to respond. We try to respond to all legitimate requests within one month. Occasionally it may take us longer than a month if your request is particularly complex or you have made several requests. In this case, we will notify you and keep you updated.
textContent9: For questions or complaints about this Privacy Policy or ATHLEAD INDONESIA’s handling of personal information, please contact
textContent9a: For other questions or complaints, you can contact us via email at the following contacts:
